passages.title: Beginnings
passages.content: You are in a small, dimly lit room. There is a door in front of you. You hear a faint voice coming from the other side of the door. It says, "I am the ghost of the house. I will grant you one wish. What is your wish?"

passages.title: Another room
passages.content: You find yourself in a larger room, filled with dusty furniture and cobwebs. There's an old, worn-out book lying on a table in the corner of the room.

passages.title: The book of spells
passages.content: As you open the book, you discover it's full of ancient spells and enchantments. You can feel the power emanating from the pages.

links.text: Close the book and go back

passages.title: Random spell
passages.content: You read a random spell out loud, and suddenly the room is filled with bright light! When the light fades, you find yourself back in the small, dimly lit room where you started.

passages.title: More exploration
passages.content: You decide to explore the house further and find a hidden door that leads to a secret chamber. Inside, you discover a treasure chest!

links.text: Go back to the small, dimly lit room

passages.title: Treasure chest
passages.content: You open the treasure chest, and inside you find a pile of gold coins and precious gems. You've found the hidden treasure of the haunted house!

links.text: Take the treasure and leave the house

passages.title: Leave
passages.content: Having seen enough of the haunted house, you decide to leave. You exit the house and never look back.
